{"id":542735093,"lang":"java","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1629694792,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/542735093/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"39.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int[][] grid;\n    boolean[][] seen;\n\n    public int area(int r, int c) {\n        if (r < 0 || r >= grid.length || c < 0 || c >= grid[0].length ||\n                seen[r][c] || grid[r][c] == 0)\n            return 0;\n        seen[r][c] = true;\n        return (1 + area(r+1, c) + area(r-1, c)\n                  + area(r, c-1) + area(r, c+1));\n    }\n\n    public int maxAreaOfIsland(int[][] grid) {\n        this.grid = grid;\n        seen = new boolean[grid.length][grid[0].length];\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int r = 0; r < grid.length; r++) {\n            for (int c = 0; c < grid[0].length; c++) {\n                ans = Math.max(ans, area(r, c));\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
